seo.title: About SustainSage
seo.description: Meet the bilingual coaches behind SustainSage and learn how our ICF-aligned practice supports UK transitions with consent and care.

hero.title: We are bilingual ICF coaches who live between cultures too.
hero.subtitle: We hold space for UK transitions with curiosity, co-creation, and respect for your pace.
hero.note: Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, medical, financial, or immigration advice.

clients.title: What clients often bring
clients.subtitle: Themes we regularly explore together.
items: Relocating to or within the UK while balancing visas, family, and work expectations.
Returning to paid work after caregiving, study, illness, or a sabbatical.
Leading across cultures, languages, or distributed teams and wanting a reflective partner.
Planning career experiments without losing wellbeing, identity, or community ties.

how.title: How we coach
how.subtitle: Grounded, ICF-aligned coaching with clear agreements.

cards.title: Client-led
cards.body: You set the pace, depth, and agenda each time.
points: We start every session by naming what would make it useful for you today.
You choose actions and experiments; we hold space, questions, and accountability you consent to.

cards.title: Reflective & practical
cards.body: We blend reflection with experiments that fit real life.
points: Expect grounding exercises, reframing, and systems-aware mapping when it helps clarity.
We co-design small, doable experiments so learning continues between sessions.

cards.title: Ethics & care
cards.body: Supervision-supported practice guided by the ICF Code of Ethics.
points: Confidentiality is honoured within safeguarding and legal duties, named upfront.
We signpost therapy, legal, medical, or immigration professionals when those services are needed.

coaches.title: Your coaches
coaches.subtitle: Two practitioners who have navigated cross-border careers themselves.

cards.name: Hao-Cheng Tsai
cards.summary: Roots in civic innovation and public service design. Hao-Cheng supports mid-career professionals and teams to move with clarity while honouring social impact commitments.

cards.name: Yi-Ling Lai
cards.summary: Background across community learning and intercultural facilitation. Yi-Ling holds multilingual spaces for caregivers, leaders, and founders returning to work with steadiness.

notFit.title: Where coaching is not a fit
notFit.subtitle: We are transparent when another form of support would serve you better.
items: We do not provide therapy, counselling, or crisis intervention.
We do not offer legal, immigration, financial, or medical advice.
We will not make decisions for you or guarantee specific outcomes.
If safeguarding concerns arise, we will follow legal duties and signpost appropriate services.

cta.title: Curious whether we are the right coaches?
cta.body: Share the focus you are carrying. We will suggest next steps or point you to other support with no pressure.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
